overview:
As Chief Operating Officer, Clay Olivier is responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of Volusion. Olivier also leads the overall marketing efforts of Volusion in his role as CMO. Prior to working at Volusion, Olivier worked at Dell where he co-managed the Large Opportunity Group in the Business Sales Division.

During his tenure at Dell, Olivier was recognized numerous times for outstanding performance. In 2002, Olivier was named Dell’s Manager of the Year. Olivier also contributed to the planning and development of the internal sales software used in Dell’s Small and Medium Business Sales Division. In addition to developing several small businesses over the years, Olivier was also a successful Registered Stock Broker in the securities industry.

After joining Sproles in 2004, Olivier managed the marketing and business expansion efforts of Volusion, playing an integral part in its growth of 1900% between 2004 and 2007.
